open_rule1: 0.1 < agg.avg_candles < 0.4 and perc_diff(agg.avg_candles, agg.candle_size) > 300 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].STX_22[0] == -1 and res[0].close < res[1].close and agg.bb_size > 1
open_rule2: agg.avg_candles == 0 and agg.candle_size > 1 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].STX_22[0] == -1 and res[0].close < res[1].close and agg.bb_size > 1
open_rule3: 0 < agg.avg_candles < 0.1 and perc_diff(agg.avg_candles, agg.candle_size) > 1000 and res[0].numTrades > 50 and res[0].STX_22[0] == -1 and res[0].close < res[1].close and agg.bb_size > 1
open_rule4: res[0].HA_close < res[0].HA_open and res[1].HA_close < res[1].HA_open and res[2].HA_close > res[2].HA_open and res[3].HA_close > res[3].HA_open and res[0].STX_22[0] < 0 and res[0].numTrades > 10
